metadata.file: /Users/alignmentnerd/Library/Mobile Documents/com~apple~CloudDocs/Music/Music/Media.localized/Music/Architect of Rhyme/Unknown Album/Allergic to Bullshit Pt. 2 (The Mod squad diss)(Option 2 of 2).wav

transcript: Achoo! Excuse me. My speech to text is working finally. So I can say this clearly. Fuck that. I think I caught something from the internet. What is it? I think it's the rules. I waited 24 hours just to drop the track. I checked the guidelines. Man, I watched my own back. I posted high on physics. It's a science pun. But the mod saw the title and he reached for the gun. Man, hammer! Now I'm flagged for a drug that doesn't exist unless you store calculus. Yesterday I posted two and it was all goo...
